header.note: The source node in most cases contains the sample message as written by the developer. If it looks like a dot-delimitted string such as "form.label.firstname", then the developer has not provided a default message.

trans-unit.resname: %VO2max% is a scientific metric for the maximal oxygen uptake that is highly correlated with one's maximal running performance. Still, two athletes with equal %VO2max% values do not need to perform equally as their efficiency may differ. Instead of the exact %VO2max% (which can be measured in a lab), the combination of %VO2max% and running efficiency is of intereset. The resulting Effective %VO2max% can be used as direct predictor for upcoming running events.
trans-unit.source: %VO2max% is a scientific metric for the maximal oxygen uptake that is highly correlated with one's maximal running performance. Still, two athletes with equal %VO2max% values do not need to perform equally as their efficiency may differ. Instead of the exact %VO2max% (which can be measured in a lab), the combination of %VO2max% and running efficiency is of intereset. The resulting Effective %VO2max% can be used as direct predictor for upcoming running events.
trans-unit.target: %VO2max% ist eine wissenschaftliche Größe für die maximale Sauerstoffaufnahme, die in hohem Maß mit der Laufperformance korreliert. Dennoch können zwei Athleten mit gleichen %VO2max%-Werten nicht zwingend die gleiche Leistung erbringen, da ihre Effizienz unterschiedlich sein kann. An Stelle des exakten %VO2max%-Wertes (der im Labor gemessen werden kann) ist die Kombination von %VO2max% and der Laufeffizenz interessanter. Der resultierende Effektive %VO2max% kann dann als Indikator für anstehende Wettkämpfe dienen.

trans-unit.resname: Absolute values of ATL are hard to interpret, as preferred values vary from athlete to athlete depending on their current level. Instead of showing absolute values, Runalyze uses the alltime maximum ATL to express current ATL as percentage. In this way, ATL values are always relative to the athlete's maximum. Still, if an athlete was overtraining once, reaching 100% ATL is not recommended.
trans-unit.source: Absolute values of ATL are hard to interpret, as preferred values vary from athlete to athlete depending on their current level. Instead of showing absolute values, Runalyze uses the alltime maximum ATL to express current ATL as percentage. In this way, ATL values are always relative to the athlete's maximum. Still, if an athlete was overtraining once, reaching 100% ATL is not recommended.
trans-unit.target: Absolute Werte von ATL sind schwer zu interpretieren, da die bevorzugten Werte von Athlet zu Athlet je nach aktuellem Niveau variieren. Anstatt absolute Werte anzuzeigen, verwendet Runalyze den dauerhaften maximalen ATL, um den aktuellen ATL in Prozent auszudrücken. Auf diese Weise sind die ATL-Werte immer relativ zum Maximum des Athleten. Wenn ein Athlete schon im Übertraining war ist das wiederholte Erreichen von 100% ATL nicht empfohlen.

trans-unit.resname: Actual Training Load
trans-unit.source: Actual Training Load
trans-unit.target: Aktuelle Trainigsbelastung

trans-unit.resname: Actual Training Load represents your current degree of fatigue, being an exponentially weighted average of your training load (i.e. %trimp%) over a period of 7 days by default.
trans-unit.source: Actual Training Load represents your current degree of fatigue, being an exponentially weighted average of your training load (i.e. %trimp%) over a period of 7 days by default.
trans-unit.target: Die tatsächliche Trainingsbelastung stellt Ihren aktuellen Ermüdungsgrad dar und ist ein exponentiell gewichteter Durchschnitt Ihrer Trainingsbelastung (d.h. %trimp%) über einen Zeitraum von standardmäßig 7 Tagen.

trans-unit.resname: As absolute heart rates may relate to different intensities depending on the maximum, all heart rate related calculations are based on relative heart rates and thus require an appropriate maximum heart rate to be given.
trans-unit.source: As absolute heart rates may relate to different intensities depending on the maximum, all heart rate related calculations are based on relative heart rates and thus require an appropriate maximum heart rate to be given.
trans-unit.target: Da sich absolute Herzfrequenzen je nach Maximum auf unterschiedliche Intensitäten beziehen können, basieren alle herzfrequenzbezogenen Berechnungen auf relativen Herzfrequenzen und erfordern daher eine entsprechende maximale Herzfrequenz.

trans-unit.resname: As everybody’s heart rate may behave differently, Runalyze uses an additional individual correction factor which is calculated based on one's best race and its heart rate automatically. Alternatively, athletes can pick a manual correction factor.
trans-unit.source: As everybody’s heart rate may behave differently, Runalyze uses an additional individual correction factor which is calculated based on one's best race and its heart rate automatically. Alternatively, athletes can pick a manual correction factor.
trans-unit.target: Da sich die Herzfrequenz eines jeden Athleten unterschiedlich verhält, nutzt Runalyze einen zusätzlichen individuellen Korrekturfaktor, der automatisch anhand des besten Wettkampfes und der dabei erreichten Herzfrequenz ermittelt wird. Alternativ können Athleten einen manuellen Korrekturfaktor festlegen.

trans-unit.resname: By default, these calculations are based on the training of the last six months, while the kilometres made a week count 2/3 and the long distance runs account for 1/3 of the 'Marathon shape'. These parameters can be changed individually by every athlete.
trans-unit.source: By default, these calculations are based on the training of the last six months, while the kilometres made a week count 2/3 and the long distance runs account for 1/3 of the 'Marathon shape'. These parameters can be changed individually by every athlete.
trans-unit.target: Standardmäßig basieren diese Berechnungen auf dem Training der letzten sechs Monate, wobei die Wochenkilometer zu 2/3 und die langen Läufe zu 1/3 für die "Marathonform" zählen. Diese Parameter können individuell angepasst werden.

trans-unit.source: Caution
trans-unit.target: Vorsicht

trans-unit.resname: Chronic Training Load
trans-unit.source: Chronic Training Load
trans-unit.target: Chronic Training Load

trans-unit.resname: Chronic Training Load represents your current degree of fitness, being an exponentially weighted average of your training load (i.e. %trimp%) over a period of 42 days by default.
trans-unit.source: Chronic Training Load represents your current degree of fitness, being an exponentially weighted average of your training load (i.e. %trimp%) over a period of 42 days by default.
trans-unit.target: Chronische Trainingsbelastung stellt Ihren aktuellen Fitnessgrad dar und ist ein exponentiell gewichteter Durchschnitt Ihrer Trainingsbelastung (d.h. %trimp%) über einen Zeitraum von standardmäßig 42 Tagen.

trans-unit.source: Danger
trans-unit.target: Warnung

trans-unit.resname: Does not improve cardiorespiratory fitness. This is suitable for recovery and developing endurance.
trans-unit.source: Does not improve cardiorespiratory fitness. This is suitable for recovery and developing endurance.
trans-unit.target: Verbessert nicht die kardiorespiratorische Fitness. Dies ist für die Regeneration und die Entwicklung der Ausdauer geeignet.

trans-unit.resname: Does only increase cardiorespiratory fitness if adequate recovery is applied afterwards.
trans-unit.source: Does only increase cardiorespiratory fitness if adequate recovery is applied afterwards.
trans-unit.target: Erhöht die kardiorespiratorische Fitness nur, wenn danach eine ausreichende Regeneration erfolgt.

trans-unit.resname: Easy TRIMP
trans-unit.source: Easy TRIMP
trans-unit.target: Entspannter TRIMP

trans-unit.resname: Easy TRIMP is the maximal allowed TRIMP for the following day that will keep TSB at 0, i.e. keeps a balanced training stress.
trans-unit.source: Easy TRIMP is the maximal allowed TRIMP for the following day that will keep TSB at 0, i.e. keeps a balanced training stress.
trans-unit.target: Easy TRIMP ist der maximal erlaubte TRIMP für den nächsten Tag, der den TSB auf 0 hält, d.h. einen ausgeglichenen Trainingsstress hält.

trans-unit.resname: Every athlete has to test his maximal heart rate as it's highly individual and common rules of thumb may be far off for a single person.
trans-unit.source: Every athlete has to test his maximal heart rate as it's highly individual and common rules of thumb may be far off for a single person.
trans-unit.target: Jeder Athlet muss seine maximale Herzfrequenz selbst testen, da sie sehr individuell ist und typische Daumenregeln für einzelne Personen weit daneben liegen können.

trans-unit.resname: Extreme caution
trans-unit.source: Extreme caution
trans-unit.target: Erhöhte Vorsicht

trans-unit.resname: Extreme danger
trans-unit.source: Extreme danger
trans-unit.target: Erhöhte Gefahr

trans-unit.resname: Extremely hard
trans-unit.source: Extremely hard
trans-unit.target: extrem anstrengend

trans-unit.resname: Extremely light
trans-unit.source: Extremely light
trans-unit.target: Extrem leicht

trans-unit.resname: Fatigue is possible with prolonged exposure and activity. Continuing activity could result in heat cramps.
trans-unit.source: Fatigue is possible with prolonged exposure and activity. Continuing activity could result in heat cramps.
trans-unit.target: Ermüdung ist bei längerer Belastung und Aktivität möglich. Anhaltende Aktivität kann zu Hitzekrämpfen führen.

trans-unit.source: Glossary
trans-unit.target: Glossar

trans-unit.source: Hard
trans-unit.target: Hart

trans-unit.resname: Heart rate variability
trans-unit.source: Heart rate variability
trans-unit.target: Herzfrequenzvariabilität

trans-unit.resname: Heart rate variability (HRV) is the physiological phenomenon of variation in the time interval between heartbeats and is measured by the variation in the beat-to-beat interval (commonly stated as R-R interval). It is well known that HRV is directly related to the body's interdependent regulatory systems and can be a powerful measure for an athlete's recovery status.
trans-unit.source: Heart rate variability (HRV) is the physiological phenomenon of variation in the time interval between heartbeats and is measured by the variation in the beat-to-beat interval (commonly stated as R-R interval). It is well known that HRV is directly related to the body's interdependent regulatory systems and can be a powerful measure for an athlete's recovery status.
trans-unit.target: Die Herzfrequenzvariabilität (HRV) ist das physiologische Phänomen der Variation des Zeitintervalls zwischen den Herzschlägen und wird durch die Variation des Beat-to-Beat-Intervalls (allgemein als R-R-Intervall bezeichnet) gemessen. Es ist bekannt, dass die HRV in direktem Zusammenhang mit den ineinandergreifenden Regulationssystemen des Körpers steht und ein starkes Maß für den Erholungsstatus eines Sportlers sein kann.

trans-unit.resname: Heat cramps and heat exhaustion are likely; heat stroke is probable with continued activity.
trans-unit.source: Heat cramps and heat exhaustion are likely; heat stroke is probable with continued activity.
trans-unit.target: Hitzekrämpfe und Erschöpfung sind wahrscheinlich; ein Hitzschlag ist bei anhaltender Aktivität wahrscheinlich.

trans-unit.resname: Heat cramps and heat exhaustion are possible. Continuing activity could result in heat stroke.
trans-unit.source: Heat cramps and heat exhaustion are possible. Continuing activity could result in heat stroke.
trans-unit.target: Hitzekrämpfe und Erschöpfung sind möglich. Anhaltende Aktivität kann zu einem Hitzschlag führen.

trans-unit.resname: Heat index
trans-unit.source: Heat index
trans-unit.target: Hitzeindex

trans-unit.resname: Heat index levels
trans-unit.source: Heat index levels
trans-unit.target: Hitzeindexlevel

trans-unit.resname: Heat stroke is imminent.
trans-unit.source: Heat stroke is imminent.
trans-unit.target: Hitzschlag und Sonnenstich sind sehr wahrscheinlich.

trans-unit.resname: Highly improves cardiorespiratory fitness, but requires easier workouts to balance the training.
trans-unit.source: Highly improves cardiorespiratory fitness, but requires easier workouts to balance the training.
trans-unit.target: Verbessert die kardiorespiratorische Fitness, erfordert aber ein leichteres Training, um das Training auszugleichen.

trans-unit.resname: Highly improving training effect
trans-unit.source: Highly improving training effect
trans-unit.target: Stark verbessernder Trainingseffekt

trans-unit.resname: If an important race is ahead, TSB should be clearly positive. As levels of CTL and ATL differ from athlete to athlete, no concrete suggestions can be made.
trans-unit.source: If an important race is ahead, TSB should be clearly positive. As levels of CTL and ATL differ from athlete to athlete, no concrete suggestions can be made.
trans-unit.target: Wenn ein wichtiges Rennen bevorsteht, sollte die TSB deutlich positiv sein. Da sich die CTL- und ATL-Werte von Athlet zu Athlet unterscheiden, können keine konkreten Vorschläge gemacht werden.

trans-unit.resname: Improves cardiorespiratory fitness.
trans-unit.source: Improves cardiorespiratory fitness.
trans-unit.target: Verbessert die kardiorespiratorische Fitness.

trans-unit.resname: Improving training effect
trans-unit.source: Improving training effect
trans-unit.target: Verbessernder Trainingseffekt

trans-unit.resname: In Runalyze, windchill is a metric for the apparent temperature that takes the Wind Chill effect into account.
trans-unit.source: In Runalyze, windchill is a metric for the apparent temperature that takes the Wind Chill effect into account.
trans-unit.target: In Runalyze ist Windchill eine Metrik für die scheinbare Temperatur, die den Windchill-Effekt berücksichtigt.

trans-unit.source: Light
trans-unit.target: leicht

trans-unit.resname: Maintaining training effect
trans-unit.source: Maintaining training effect
trans-unit.target: Aufrechterhaltung des Trainingzustandes

trans-unit.resname: Maintains cardiorespiratory fitness and builds foundation for more demanding workours in future.
trans-unit.source: Maintains cardiorespiratory fitness and builds foundation for more demanding workours in future.
trans-unit.target: Erhält die kardiorespiratorische Fitness und bildet die Grundlage für ein anspruchsvolleres Training in der Zukunft.

trans-unit.resname: Marathon shape
trans-unit.source: Marathon shape
trans-unit.target: Marathonform

trans-unit.resname: Maximal exertion
trans-unit.source: Maximal exertion
trans-unit.target: Maximale Belastung

trans-unit.resname: Maximum heart rate
trans-unit.source: Maximum heart rate
trans-unit.target: Maximale Herzfrequenz

trans-unit.resname: Measuring resting heart rate each day as part of a morning ritual is recommended for athletes. Increases in resting heart rate can indicate stress and overtraining.
trans-unit.source: Measuring resting heart rate each day as part of a morning ritual is recommended for athletes. Increases in resting heart rate can indicate stress and overtraining.
trans-unit.target: Athleten wird empfohlen, jeden Morgen den Ruhepuls zu messen. Erhöhte Werte können auf Stress oder Übertraining hindeuten.

trans-unit.resname: Metrics for HRV
trans-unit.source: Metrics for HRV
trans-unit.target: Metriken für HRV

trans-unit.resname: Minor training effect
trans-unit.source: Minor training effect
trans-unit.target: Geringer Trainingseffekt

trans-unit.source: Monotony
trans-unit.target: Monotonie

trans-unit.resname: Natural logarithm of RMSSD
trans-unit.source: Natural logarithm of RMSSD
trans-unit.target: Natürlicher Logarithmus des RMSSD

trans-unit.resname: No effect
trans-unit.source: No effect
trans-unit.target: Keine Auswirkungen

trans-unit.resname: No exertion at all
trans-unit.source: No exertion at all
trans-unit.target: Überhaupt keine Anstrengung

trans-unit.resname: No training effect
trans-unit.source: No training effect
trans-unit.target: Kein Trainingeffekt

trans-unit.resname: Notice: This calculation is based on the sum of the *all day* TRIMP value. It is based on the overall strain made a day, no matter which kind of activity has been done.
trans-unit.source: Notice: This calculation is based on the sum of the *all day* TRIMP value. It is based on the overall strain made a day, no matter which kind of activity has been done.
trans-unit.target: Hinweis: Diese Berechnung basiert auf der Summe aller TRIMP-Werte eines Tages. Sie berücksichtigt daher nur die gesamte Trainingsbelastung eines Tages, egal welche Sportarten absolviert wurden.

trans-unit.source: Overtraining
trans-unit.target: Übertraining

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Übersicht

trans-unit.resname: Performance condition
trans-unit.source: Performance condition
trans-unit.target: Performance condition

trans-unit.resname: Performance condition is a metric provided by Garmin that analyzes pace, heart rate and heart rate variability within the first 20 minutes of an activity to make a real-time assessment of your ability to perform compared to your current fitness level.
trans-unit.source: Performance condition is a metric provided by Garmin that analyzes pace, heart rate and heart rate variability within the first 20 minutes of an activity to make a real-time assessment of your ability to perform compared to your current fitness level.
trans-unit.target: Die Performance Condition ist eine von Garmin bereitgestellte Kennzahl, die die Geschwindigkeit, die Herzfrequenz und die Herzfrequenzvariabilität innerhalb der ersten 20 Minuten einer Aktivität analysiert, um eine Echtzeitbewertung Ihrer Leistungsfähigkeit im Vergleich zu Ihrem aktuellen Fitnessniveau vorzunehmen.

trans-unit.resname: Performance condition values range from +20 to -20, whereby positive values mean that you are rested and in shape for a good and intense workout.
trans-unit.source: Performance condition values range from +20 to -20, whereby positive values mean that you are rested and in shape for a good and intense workout.
trans-unit.target: Die Werte der Performance Condition reichen von +20 bis -20, wobei positive Werte bedeuten, dass Sie ausgeruht und fit für ein gutes und intensives Training sind.

trans-unit.resname: Proportion of successive R-R intervals that differ by more than %s ms
trans-unit.source: Proportion of successive R-R intervals that differ by more than %s ms
trans-unit.target: Anteil der aufeinanderfolgenden R-R-Intervalle, die sich um mehr als %s ms unterscheiden

trans-unit.resname: RPE scale
trans-unit.source: RPE scale
trans-unit.target: RPE-Skala

trans-unit.resname: Rate of Perceived Exertion
trans-unit.source: Rate of Perceived Exertion
trans-unit.target: Gefühlte Belastung

trans-unit.resname: Rated Perceived Exertion (RPE) is a quantitive measure for the physical exertion of an activity. this rating is frequently used in studies and is measured by the Borg rating or RPE scale. The range of 6-20 follows the heart rate of a healthy young adult (by multiplying with 10).
trans-unit.source: Rated Perceived Exertion (RPE) is a quantitive measure for the physical exertion of an activity. this rating is frequently used in studies and is measured by the Borg rating or RPE scale. The range of 6-20 follows the heart rate of a healthy young adult (by multiplying with 10).
trans-unit.target: Rated Perceived Exertion (RPE) ist ein quantitatives Maß für die körperliche Anstrengung einer Aktivität. Dieses Rating wird häufig in Studien verwendet und wird anhand des Borg-Ratings oder der RPE-Skala gemessen. Der Bereich von 6-20 folgt der Herzfrequenz eines gesunden jungen Erwachsenen (durch Multiplikation mit 10).

trans-unit.source: References
trans-unit.target: Referenzen

trans-unit.resname: Resting heart rate
trans-unit.source: Resting heart rate
trans-unit.target: Ruheherzfrequenz

trans-unit.resname: Root mean square of successive differences
trans-unit.source: Root mean square of successive differences
trans-unit.target: Wurzelmittelwert der aufeinanderfolgenden Differenzen

trans-unit.resname: Runalyze estimates the Effective %VO2max% for every run with heart rate data based on the relation of heart rate and pace. Optionally, elevation can be taken into account as well. The average of these values will be used as the athlete's current shape.
trans-unit.source: Runalyze estimates the Effective %VO2max% for every run with heart rate data based on the relation of heart rate and pace. Optionally, elevation can be taken into account as well. The average of these values will be used as the athlete's current shape.
trans-unit.target: Runalyze schätzt die effektive %VO2max% für jeden Lauf mit Herzfrequenzdaten basierend auf dem Verhältnis von Herzfrequenz und Geschwindigkeit. Optional kann auch die Höhe berücksichtigt werden. Der Mittelwert dieser Werte wird als aktuelle Form des Athleten verwendet.

trans-unit.resname: Runalyze reads training effect values only when importing *.fit-files (provided that the file contains a training effect value).
trans-unit.source: Runalyze reads training effect values only when importing *.fit-files (provided that the file contains a training effect value).
trans-unit.target: Runalyze liest Trainingseffektwerte nur beim Import von *.fit-Dateien (sofern die Datei einen Trainingseffektwert enthält).

trans-unit.resname: Runalyze tries to estimate the athlete's limit by current ATL and gives a coloured (green/orange/red) feedback.
trans-unit.source: Runalyze tries to estimate the athlete's limit by current ATL and gives a coloured (green/orange/red) feedback.
trans-unit.target: Runalyze versucht das Limit des Athleten anhand der aktuellen ATL abzuschätzen und gibt ein farbiges (grün/orange/rot) Feedback.

trans-unit.resname: Runalyze will always use the activity's complete heart rate profile, if available, to correctly rate interval workouts.
trans-unit.source: Runalyze will always use the activity's complete heart rate profile, if available, to correctly rate interval workouts.
trans-unit.target: Runalyze verwendet immer das komplette Herzfrequenzprofil der Aktivität, falls verfügbar, um Intervalltrainings richtig zu bewerten.

trans-unit.resname: Runalyze will import performance condition from fit files if available.
trans-unit.source: Runalyze will import performance condition from fit files if available.
trans-unit.target: Runalyze importiert die Leistungsbedingung aus Fit-Dateien, falls vorhanden.

trans-unit.resname: SWOLF is a metric of swimming efficiency and is calculated as sum of time (in seconds) and stroke count for a given distance (traditionally the pool length, i.e. 50m). Stroke count is used as an indicator of effort, but it's not always a good one.
trans-unit.source: SWOLF is a metric of swimming efficiency and is calculated as sum of time (in seconds) and stroke count for a given distance (traditionally the pool length, i.e. 50m). Stroke count is used as an indicator of effort, but it's not always a good one.
trans-unit.target: SWOLF ist ein Maß für die Schwimmleistung und wird als Summe aus Zeit (in Sekunden) und Schlagzahl für eine bestimmte Strecke (traditionell die Beckenlänge, d.h. 50m) berechnet. Die Hubzahl wird als Indikator für die Anstrengung verwendet, aber sie ist nicht immer gut.

trans-unit.resname: See also
trans-unit.source: See also
trans-unit.target: Siehe auch

trans-unit.resname: Similar to %atl%, Runalyze uses the alltime maximum CTL to express current CTL as percentage.
trans-unit.source: Similar to %atl%, Runalyze uses the alltime maximum CTL to express current CTL as percentage.
trans-unit.target: Ähnlich wie %atl% verwendet Runalyze die dauerhafte maximale CTL, um die aktuelle CTL in Prozent auszudrücken.

trans-unit.resname: Similarly, SWOLF cycles is calculated as sum of time (in seconds) and stroke cycles (i.e. number of hand entries only on one side). Some people prefer SWOLF cycles as metric for finding one's most efficient swimming style.
trans-unit.source: Similarly, SWOLF cycles is calculated as sum of time (in seconds) and stroke cycles (i.e. number of hand entries only on one side). Some people prefer SWOLF cycles as metric for finding one's most efficient swimming style.
trans-unit.target: Ebenso werden SWOLF-Zyklen als Summe aus Zeit (in Sekunden) und Schlägen (d.h. Anzahl der Handeingaben nur auf einer Seite) berechnet. Einige Leute bevorzugen SWOLF-Zyklen als Metrik, um den effizientesten Schwimmstil zu finden.

trans-unit.resname: Somewhat hard
trans-unit.source: Somewhat hard
trans-unit.target: etwas anstrengend

trans-unit.resname: Standard deviation of R-R intervals
trans-unit.source: Standard deviation of R-R intervals
trans-unit.target: Standardabweichung der R-R-Intervalle

trans-unit.resname: Standard deviation of the average R-R intervals calculated over 5 minutes
trans-unit.source: Standard deviation of the average R-R intervals calculated over 5 minutes
trans-unit.target: Standardabweichung der mittleren R-R-Intervalle für jeweils 5 Minuten

trans-unit.source: Suggestion
trans-unit.target: Suggestion

trans-unit.resname: Temperature and humidity should not have any effect.
trans-unit.source: Temperature and humidity should not have any effect.
trans-unit.target: Temperatur und Luftfeuchtigkeit sollten keinen Effekt haben.

trans-unit.resname: The SWOLF score is useful when trying different combinations of stroke rate and stroke length to find the most efficient one, but it's not meaningful for comparing different swimmers.
trans-unit.source: The SWOLF score is useful when trying different combinations of stroke rate and stroke length to find the most efficient one, but it's not meaningful for comparing different swimmers.
trans-unit.target: Der SWOLF-Wert ist nützlich, wenn man verschiedene Kombinationen von Schlagzahl und Schlaglänge ausprobiert, um die effizienteste zu finden, aber er ist für den Vergleich verschiedener Schwimmer nicht aussagekräftig.

trans-unit.resname: The Wind Chill effect describes the rate of heat loss from the human body resulting from the combined effect of low temperature and wind. As winds increase, heat is carried away from the body at a faster rate, driving down both the skin temperature and eventually the internal body temperature.
trans-unit.source: The Wind Chill effect describes the rate of heat loss from the human body resulting from the combined effect of low temperature and wind. As winds increase, heat is carried away from the body at a faster rate, driving down both the skin temperature and eventually the internal body temperature.
trans-unit.target: Der Wind-Chill-Effekt beschreibt den Wärmeverlust des menschlichen Körpers, der sich aus der Kombination von niedriger Temperatur und Wind ergibt. Wenn der Wind zunimmt, wird die Wärme schneller vom Körper weggetragen, wodurch sowohl die Hauttemperatur als auch die innere Körpertemperatur gesenkt wird.

trans-unit.resname: The body's heart rate is measured in beats per minute [bpm] and its maximal possible value is defined as maximum heart rate. Athlete's heart rates must always be considered relatively to their maximum, normally stated as [%HRmax].
trans-unit.source: The body's heart rate is measured in beats per minute [bpm] and its maximal possible value is defined as maximum heart rate. Athlete's heart rates must always be considered relatively to their maximum, normally stated as [%HRmax].
trans-unit.target: Die Herzfrequenz des Körpers wird in Schlägen pro Minute (bpm) gemessen und der maximal mögliche Wert als maximale Herzfrequenz definiert. Die Herzfrequenz des Athleten muss immer relativ zu seinem Maximum betrachtet werden, normalerweise angegeben als[%HRmax].

trans-unit.resname: The heat index as an index that combines air temperature and relative humidity to determine the human-perceived equivalent temperature. The resulting apparent temperature is crucial to assess possible effects of the weather for the human body. High relative humidity reduces the evaporation rate of sweat, lowering the body's self-cooling.
trans-unit.source: The heat index as an index that combines air temperature and relative humidity to determine the human-perceived equivalent temperature. The resulting apparent temperature is crucial to assess possible effects of the weather for the human body. High relative humidity reduces the evaporation rate of sweat, lowering the body's self-cooling.
trans-unit.target: Der Wärmeindex ist ein Index, der Lufttemperatur und relative Luftfeuchtigkeit kombiniert, um die vom Menschen wahrgenommene äquivalente Temperatur zu bestimmen. Die daraus resultierende scheinbare Temperatur ist entscheidend, um mögliche Auswirkungen des Wetters auf den menschlichen Körper abzuschätzen. Eine hohe relative Luftfeuchtigkeit reduziert die Verdunstungsrate des Schweißes und senkt die Selbstkühlung des Körpers.

trans-unit.resname: The heat index is calculated based on temperatures in the shade. Exposure to full sunshine can increase heat index values by up to %temp%.
trans-unit.source: The heat index is calculated based on temperatures in the shade. Exposure to full sunshine can increase heat index values by up to %temp%.
trans-unit.target: Der Wärmeindex wird anhand der Temperaturen im Schatten berechnet. Bei voller Sonneneinstrahlung kann der Wärmeindex um bis zu %temp% steigen.

trans-unit.resname: The logarithm is used to achieve a better scaling.
trans-unit.source: The logarithm is used to achieve a better scaling.
trans-unit.target: Der Logarithmus wird verwendet, um eine bessere Skalierung zu erreichen.

trans-unit.resname: The marathon shape is an invention of Runalyze to optimize prognoses for long distances, that are based on the effective VO2max. These prognoses normally can't consider whether the athlete has the optimal fitness or endurance for a marathon. The marathon shape is the solution for this problem, as the prognoses are continually adjusted for missing fitness.
trans-unit.source: The marathon shape is an invention of Runalyze to optimize prognoses for long distances, that are based on the effective VO2max. These prognoses normally can't consider whether the athlete has the optimal fitness or endurance for a marathon. The marathon shape is the solution for this problem, as the prognoses are continually adjusted for missing fitness.
trans-unit.target: Die Marathonform ist eine Erfindung von Runalyze zur Optimierung von Prognosen für lange Strecken, die auf dem effektiven VO2max basieren. Diese Prognosen können normalerweise nicht berücksichtigen, ob der Athlet die optimale Fitness oder Ausdauer für einen Marathon hat. Die Marathonform ist die Lösung für dieses Problem, da die Prognosen ständig an die fehlende Fitness angepasst werden.

trans-unit.resname: The resting heart rate is defined as the heart rate when a person is awake and at complete rest. Well-conditioned endurance athletes typically have lower resting heart rates (e.g. 30 - 50 bpm) than unathletic people (e.g. 50 - 90 bpm).
trans-unit.source: The resting heart rate is defined as the heart rate when a person is awake and at complete rest. Well-conditioned endurance athletes typically have lower resting heart rates (e.g. 30 - 50 bpm) than unathletic people (e.g. 50 - 90 bpm).
trans-unit.target: Die Ruheherzfrequenz ist definiert als die Herzfrequenz, wenn eine Person wach und in völliger Ruhe ist. Gut konditionierte Ausdauersportler haben typischerweise niedrigere Ruheherzfrequenzen (z.B. 30 - 50 bpm) als unsportlichere Menschen (z.B. 50 - 90 bpm).

trans-unit.resname: The training effect is a measure by Firstbeat and Garmin to evaluate the training's ffort concerning the impact on the physiology, in particular future aerobic performance. Garmin devices analyze heart rate data during activity to estimate EPOC (excess post-exercise oxygen consumption) and determine the related training effect. Training effect values are useful to control one's weekly training to prevent overtraining.
trans-unit.source: The training effect is a measure by Firstbeat and Garmin to evaluate the training's ffort concerning the impact on the physiology, in particular future aerobic performance. Garmin devices analyze heart rate data during activity to estimate EPOC (excess post-exercise oxygen consumption) and determine the related training effect. Training effect values are useful to control one's weekly training to prevent overtraining.
trans-unit.target: Der Trainingseffekt ist eine Maßeinheit von Firstbeat und Garmin, um das Wohlbefinden des Trainings hinsichtlich der Auswirkungen auf die Physiologie, insbesondere der zukünftigen aeroben Leistungsfähigkeit, zu bewerten. Garmin-Geräte analysieren die Herzfrequenzdaten während der Aktivität, um den EPOC-Wert (überschüssiger Sauerstoffverbrauch nach dem Training) abzuschätzen und den damit verbundenen Trainingseffekt zu ermitteln. Trainingseffektwerte sind nützlich, um das wöchentliche Training zu kontrollieren und Übertraining zu vermeiden.

trans-unit.resname: The training monotony is a method for evaluating the similarity of the daily training and is based on the variation of the daily TRIMP values over the last seven days. The lower the variation the higher the monotony. Results underneath 1.5 are considered as recommendable, results above 2.0 as critical. To recognise overtraining, one should bear training strain in mind as that value rates monotony and training load together.
trans-unit.source: The training monotony is a method for evaluating the similarity of the daily training and is based on the variation of the daily TRIMP values over the last seven days. The lower the variation the higher the monotony. Results underneath 1.5 are considered as recommendable, results above 2.0 as critical. To recognise overtraining, one should bear training strain in mind as that value rates monotony and training load together.
trans-unit.target: Die Trainingsmonotonie ist eine Methode zur Bewertung der Ähnlichkeit des täglichen Trainings und basiert auf der Variation der täglichen TRIMP-Werte über die letzten sieben Tage. Je geringer die Variation, desto höher die Monotonie. Ergebnisse unter 1,5 gelten als empfehlenswert, Ergebnisse über 2,0 als kritisch. Um Übertraining zu erkennen, sollte man die Trainingsbelastung im Auge behalten, da dieser Wert Monotonie und Trainingsbelastung gemeinsam bewertet.

trans-unit.resname: The training strain calculates the risk of overtraining by combining training monotony and the sum of all TRIMP values for a given period. The risk of overtraining has an individual limit for every single athlete.
trans-unit.source: The training strain calculates the risk of overtraining by combining training monotony and the sum of all TRIMP values for a given period. The risk of overtraining has an individual limit for every single athlete.
trans-unit.target: Die Trainingsbelastung berechnet das Risiko eines Übertrainings durch die Kombination von Trainingsmonotonie und der Summe aller TRIMP-Werte für einen bestimmten Zeitraum. Das Risiko des Übertrainings hat für jeden einzelnen Athleten ein individuelles Limit.

trans-unit.resname: This value is said to be a strong indicator for parasympathetic activity and thus large values indicate a better recovery status.
trans-unit.source: This value is said to be a strong indicator for parasympathetic activity and thus large values indicate a better recovery status.
trans-unit.target: Dieser Wert soll ein starker Indikator für parasympathische Aktivität sein und große Werte deuten daher auf einen besseren Erholungszustand hin.

trans-unit.resname: To calculate the marathon shape, the kilometers made a week aswell as every single run according to length are looked at. Other physical activities (e.g. cycling) are not going to be considered. The target is set to a calculated value according to the athlete's current best possible marathon time, based on the VO2max. The kilometers and the distance of the weekly long run are derived from typical marathon training plans.
trans-unit.source: To calculate the marathon shape, the kilometers made a week aswell as every single run according to length are looked at. Other physical activities (e.g. cycling) are not going to be considered. The target is set to a calculated value according to the athlete's current best possible marathon time, based on the VO2max. The kilometers and the distance of the weekly long run are derived from typical marathon training plans.
trans-unit.target: Zur Berechnung der Marathonform werden die Kilometer pro Woche sowie jeder einzelne Lauf nach Länge betrachtet. Andere körperliche Aktivitäten (z.B. Radfahren) werden nicht berücksichtigt. Das Ziel wird auf einen berechneten Wert entsprechend der aktuell bestmöglichen Marathonzeit des Athleten, basierend auf dem VO2max, gesetzt. Die Kilometer und die Distanz des wöchentlichen Langlaufs ergeben sich aus typischen Marathon-Trainingsplänen.

trans-unit.resname: Training Effect Levels
trans-unit.source: Training Effect Levels
trans-unit.target: Trainingseffekt Levels

trans-unit.resname: Training Impulse
trans-unit.source: Training Impulse
trans-unit.target: Trainingsimpuls

trans-unit.resname: Training Impulse, developed by Banister in 1991, is a method to quantify training load based on heart rate and duration of an exercise. The method uses heart rate reserve, which considers %restingHeartRate% as well as %maximumHeartRate%, and a gender-specific weighting factor.
trans-unit.source: Training Impulse, developed by Banister in 1991, is a method to quantify training load based on heart rate and duration of an exercise. The method uses heart rate reserve, which considers %restingHeartRate% as well as %maximumHeartRate%, and a gender-specific weighting factor.
trans-unit.target: Trainingimpulse, 1991 von Banister entwickelt, ist eine Methode zur Quantifizierung der Trainingsbelastung anhand der Herzfrequenz und der Dauer einer Übung. Die Methode verwendet eine Herzfrequenzreserve, die sowohl %restingHeartRate% als auch %maximumHeartRate% berücksichtigt, und einen geschlechtsspezifischen Gewichtungsfaktor.

trans-unit.resname: Training stress balance is the difference between CTL and ATL (in absolute values) and can help as indicator for hard training (negative values) and rest (positive values).
trans-unit.source: Training stress balance is the difference between CTL and ATL (in absolute values) and can help as indicator for hard training (negative values) and rest (positive values).
trans-unit.target: Die Trainingsbelastung ist die Differenz zwischen CTL und ATL (in absoluten Werten) und kann als Indikator für hartes Training (negative Werte) und Ruhe (positive Werte) dienen.
